application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Conditions 15 (Noise Control Scheme) and 27 (Environmental Fleet Management Plan) attached to planning permission ref. 1911/APP/2012/3185 in relation to Unit 1 only. A separate application is required in order to discharge Conditions 15 (Noise Control Scheme) and 27 (Environmental Fleet Management Plan) for the remaining Units 2 and 3.
description: Part details (Unit 1 only) pursuant to Conditions 15 (Noise Control Scheme) and 27 (Environmental Fleet Management Plan) of planning permission ref. 1911/APP/2012/3185, dated 9/5/14: Erection of 4 no. industrial, warehouse, office buildings (Use Classes B1, B2 and B8) with access and servicing arrangement, car parking, landscaping and associated works (Involving demolition of existing buildings).
